successes.title: Beam: The smart projector that fits in any light socket
successes.description: The smart projector that assists you in your daily activities, controlled with your smartphone or tablet. Screw it in and have fun!

Pledges.description: SUPPORT BEAM -  Your help, at any level, brings us one step closer to realizing Beam. We will put your name on our online virtual wall of fame so we won’t forget that you helped us!
Thank you for your support! we will project Your name on our office walls using our very own office beam! Thanks for helping us realize Beam!
HOODIE - You will receive all of the above and an awesome hoodie. This hoodie will make you the best looking guy/girl in the whole wide room. It might even put you in the top 5 of your street.
FOUNDERS CLUB - You’re faster than your own projection! To reward your early support you will get Beam (with the fabric cable) for the lowest price EVER! Your Beam will be the first to ship!
EARLY BIRD - Thanks for believing in Beam and for your support. You will get Beam (with the fabric cable) for a reduced price and will get it asap!

BEAM - You just bought yourself a Beam! For a lot less than the expected retail price and you will have Beam before it hits the shelves. We will ship it with the fabric cable to you as soon as possible.
WHOLE SHEBANG - You will get Beam (with the fabric cable) plus the awesome hoodie (it will make you irresistible)
DOUBLE THE FUN - We will send you 2 Beams with the fabric cables.
SCREW FIVE ON IT - You will get 5 Beams (with the fabric cables) to make your house even more fun to live in! Or you can give them away to your friends and family (it’s your call..)
BEAM DISTRIBUTOR - 10 Beams - Maybe you have a really big house, office or you just want more Beams to spread the joy. We will ship you 10 Beams (with fabric cables).

BEAM ME UP - Partner - You will get to know the team personally and be one of the first to explore potential partnerships. We will fly you over for a 3 day trip (flight and stay included). We will make sure that you have an awesome and inspiring time!
